easy.q: I have four legs but I never walk. I rhyme with 'tree' and I help you sit. What am I?
easy.hint: Look for something you sit on.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think about how adding letters changes meaning.

hard.q: A box has two colors, inside a room with three mirrors. If you look into the first mirror, you see endless copies; into the second, you see two; into the third, you see four. How many unique images can you observe if all reflections combine? (Assume no shadows, straight lines, and each reflection doubles, then adds one).
hard.hint: Start from one image and apply the doubling/adding pattern.
